that once you've logged in, there is no way =
for the user to tell the browser

on.

o the

ion 
information with each request?  Clicking on this icon would allow the =
user to 
"manage" their current logins, including an easy way to logout fro=
m a given 
site (where logout simply means no longer sending authentication=
 
information).

Fixing this problem would make HTTP auth usable by browser=
s.  Of course, UI
